content:
Need help/advice with https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4264 please...

I don't see maintenance page after putting site in maintenance mode 路 Issue #4264 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Sometimes* when I put the site in Maintenance mode, then log out, I still see the regular frontpage, not the maintenance page. Hard-refreshing my browser doesn't help. Only clicking a link to v...
